mapper.select: select c.id,c.name,c.card from user_card c left join user u on c.user_id = u.id where u.open_id=#{openId} and c.delete_time is null
mapper.insert: insert into user_card(name,card,user_id,create_time) values(#{name},#{card},(select id from user u where u.open_id=#{open_id}),NOW());
mapper.update: update user_card set delete_time = NOW() where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from user_card c where INSTR(CONCAT(',',(select passengers_id from user_order_info r where r.id=#{rid}),','),CONCAT(',',c.id,','));
